short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows Meta Title, Description, Canonical URL, overlays images with Alt text, and highlights heading tags.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Optimize your web content with ease using META-MASTER. Designed for web producers and content creators, this powerful Chrome extension ensures your pages are SEO-friendly and consistent with just one click.

Features:

- Highlight Heading Tags: Instantly highlights all heading tags (H1, H2, H3, etc.) with easily distinguishable colors for quick and clear identification.
- Meta Information at a Glance: Displays the Meta Title and Description of the page, allowing you to verify and optimize your SEO metadata.
- Canonical URL Display: Clearly shows the canonical URL to help you manage duplicate content issues.
- Alt Text Overlay: Overlays all images with their Alt text, making it easy to spot missing or incomplete Alt descriptions.
Why Choose META-MASTER?

Improve SEO Consistency: Ensure your web pages meet SEO best practices effortlessly.
Enhance User Experience: Quickly identify and fix content issues to provide a better experience for your visitors.
Boost Efficiency: Save time with an intuitive, easy-to-use tool that provides essential information at a glance.
Get META-MASTER Today and Take Your Content to the Next Level!
